notes: this set of rules breaks the logo in the top left on youtube.com to demonstrate the ability to remove an attribute.
this shows that multiple url's rules can apply on one page. Any youtube video will have the logo destroyed by the previous url's rules, and will have a purple nav bar because of this url's rules.
this shows a use of the notStyles identifier. Any div that doesn't align-items:center on youtube.com videos will be blue
